projects.title: LAMA -  Clothing Store
projects.bodyText:
- A Clothing Store web app made using **React JS** and **Bootstrap** for frontend and **MongoDB**, **Node Js** and **Express** for back. People can view items and put in the favorites section.
 - Includes features of checkout and payment precessing.
 - It can offer discounts and sale offers to valued customer

projects.title: Web Chat App
projects.bodyText:
- A Web Chat App that uses **React**, **MaterialUI**, **Web Sockets**, **MongoDB** and **Node**. It offers real time messaging capbilites with instant updates.
 - The feature of login and authentication is present to secure user information.
 - Allow users to express themselves in emojis and sending files.

projects.title: Food Recipes
projects.bodyText:
- Web App that allow users to cook through recipes built using **React**, **Node Js**, **MongoDB** and **React-Bootstrap**.
 - Offers food recipies to users with extensive details.
 - Allow users to select throught categories and apply filters to find desired recipe. 
 - Allow users to add their own food to the collection.

projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support
